channel.title: politics on Rusland 1
channel.description: Recent content in politics on Rusland 1

item.title: Tucker Carlson and Vladimir Putin
item.description: Rurik About a quarter of the more than two-hour interview was devoted to answering the first question, or rather, to Putin’s opening monologue. It began in 862 with Prince Rurik; from there, returning to the present was quite the journey.

item.title: Putin 3x
item.description: Three portraits Putin viewed from different angles: three portraits from 2017-2018. Two are long (American and British), one is very long (Russian, with subtitles). Links to shorter clips are at the bottom. The Power of Putin – BBC Documentary (Astrobum, 2017, 43 m)
